content.rendered:
GEOKC Capital Campaign Donation

Based on the GEOKC Donors Recognition Wall opportunity, the GEOKC Captial Campaign donation areas are as follows:

  • GEOKC Building Project Seva (donation)
  • Bhoomi Daan Seva (land donation)
  • Specific Needs Awareness Plan
  • Well Wishing Opportunity
  • Natural Surrounding Areas & Beauty
  • GEOKC Endowment Fund (Specific Help)
  • Major Gifts and Planned Giving
  • GEOKC Donors Recognition Wall
  • GEOKC Donor Recognition Programs

Time Commitment:

The time commitment is the appreciation for our prospect donors who will be helping to complete the Capital Campaign process on time.

Types of Donation/Gifts & Process

Cash donation (Cash, Check, Check Card, Credit Card, Money Order):
GEOKC Capital Campaign Form Part 1 (PDF)
GEOKC Capital Campaign Donate Online Link
Donation in Person: Monday – Friday 5 – 8 p.m. at 727 5th Ave. S. #204
Minneapolis, MN 55415
Contacts: 612-540-9651
batheja.sunita@gmail.com

Major Gifts and Planned Giving & GEOKC Endowment Fund
GEOKC Capital Campaign Form Part 2 (PDF)

Contacts

For questions about any type of donations, please contact the GEOKC Campaigns Team (Team Three) at:
612-540-9651
batheja.sunita@gmail.com
